items.content_html: Secure Chat is a real-time, end-to-end encrypted messaging app where users can create or join password-protected rooms. Built with React, Node.js, and Socket.IO, it encrypts messages client-side before sending. Lightweight, fast, and deployable for private communication.
items.title: dantewarhola/secure_messaging_website: Secure Chat is a real-time, end-to-end encrypted messaging app where users can create or join password-protected rooms. Built with React, Node.js, and Socket.IO, it encrypts messages client-side before sending. Lightweight, fast, and deployable for private communication.
